metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20056 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
stb_image.h (aka the stb image loader) 2.23, as used in libsixel and other products, has an assertion failure in stbi__shiftsigned.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20056` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.6-1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.6-1
libsixel1 - 1.8.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.6-1').
